fullplot: A rich young lady marries a man without means only because her father tells her it is a way to save millions in income tax each year - by Germany's tax splitting rules for married couples.
plot: A rich young lady marries a man without means only because her father tells her it is a way to save millions in income tax each year - by Germany's tax splitting rules for married couples.
title: Wir tun es fèr Geld
